alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 15 at 2:07PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Missouri, including the following areas, in east central Missouri, Crawford MO and Washington MO. In southeast Missouri, Iron MO, Madison MO, Reynolds MO, Saint Francois MO and Sainte Genevieve MO. * WHEN...Through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Recent heavy rains have fallen over these areas. An additional 2 to 3 inches is expected to fall through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
